DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety immunogenicity Phase III lot CYD dengue vaccine pediatric population Malaysia . Primary Objectives : - To describe safety ( term solicit unsolicited adverse event ) CYD dengue vaccine subject dose . - To describe antibody response dengue virus serotype post-Dose 2 post-Dose 3
DOC.brief_title: Study Tetravalent Dengue Vaccine Healthy Children Aged 2 11 Years Malaysia
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy participant age 2 11 year receive 3 vaccination pre-determined schedule followed-up least 6 month last vaccination .
